name: t07_switch_parser
description: Switch-heavy token parser across multiple files. Dense switch tables exercise GCC's jump-table generation and stress oracle_dwarf's ability to map branch targets back to source-level cases.
oracle_pressure: Dense switch statements compile to jump tables at O1+. Oracle must correlate DW_AT_low_pc ranges within a single function to individual case labels. Enum-typed dispatching adds DW_TAG_enumeration_type cross-referencing.
